designer.name: Misha Parveen
designer.title: Graphic Designer & UI/UX Specialist
designer.bio: Hi there, this is Misha. I'm a 23-year-old girl passionate about creating and leaving a lasting mark in the world through design. Currently working at 9D Technologies, with almost 4 years in the tech industry. Experienced in illustration, graphic design, UI design, social media management, and creative direction. Known for a colorful, fun style adaptable to corporate needs.
designer.designStyle: Playful, neon, and modern aesthetic with colorful gradients and bold typography

experience.role: Social Media Manager & Digital Media Associate

responsibilities: UI/UX design for web and mobile

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.title: Brand Identity Design
projects.description: Complete brand identity packages including logo design, color palettes, typography, and brand guidelines. Creating memorable and impactful visual identities that resonate with target audiences.

projects.title: Mobile App UI/UX Design
projects.description: Modern mobile application designs with focus on user experience, intuitive navigation, and engaging visual design. Includes prototyping, wireframing, and user flow mapping.

projects.title: Social Media Content Design
projects.description: Eye-catching social media posts, promotional graphics, and campaign materials. Designed to engage audiences and drive brand awareness with colorful, modern aesthetics.

projects.title: 2D Animation & Motion Graphics
projects.description: Engaging 2D animations, promotional videos, and motion graphics. Creating dynamic visual stories that capture attention and communicate messages effectively.

projects.title: Web Design & UI
projects.description: Responsive web designs with modern layouts, intuitive user interfaces, and engaging visual elements. Focus on user experience and conversion optimization.

projects.title: Marketing Materials & Print Design
projects.description: Professional marketing collateral including business cards, letterheads, brochures, and book covers. Ensuring brand consistency across all touchpoints.

testimonials.name: Client
testimonials.text: Misha's creative approach and attention to detail transformed our brand identity. Her colorful, modern designs perfectly captured our vision.

testimonials.name: Project Manager
testimonials.text: Misha consistently delivers high-quality work and brings fresh, innovative ideas to every project. A valuable team member.

colorTheme.style: Neon Blue, Magenta, Lime Green, Yellow on Black Background
